SELECT s.SUB_ID, s.SUB_NAME, s.ZONE, s.REQUIREMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, s.STATUS, s.ZONE, s.DOC_ID, s.FEEDBACK, u.REAL_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, u.TEL, u.MAIL, s.POSE_TIME FROM `subject` s JOIN teacher t ON (t.TEACHER_ID = s.POSE_BY) JOIN USER u ON (t.USER_ID = u.USER_ID) WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
AND s.SUB_ID=#{subId}

SELECT s.SUB_ID, s.SUB_NAME, s.DOC_ID, s.REQUIREMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, s.ZONE, u.REAL_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, s.POSE_TIME, t.HOME_PAGE, t.TITLE, u.TEL, u.MAIL, c.COLLEGE_NAME, s.CAPACITY, s.CHOSEN, f.FILE_NAME, f.FILE_ID FROM `subject` s JOIN applied_subject a ON (a.SUB_ID = s.SUB_ID) JOIN teacher t ON (t.TEACHER_ID = s.POSE_BY) JOIN college c ON (c.COLLEGE_ID = t.COLLEGE_ID) JOIN USER u ON (t.USER_ID = u.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN file_storage f ON (s.DOC_ID = f.DOC_ID) WHERE s.`STATUS` = 'YTG' AND a.`STATUS` = 'YTG' AND a.STU_ID = #{stuId}
